Smitten Vorbos:
Rage drives me crazy. If You knew how I hate the Turek Orcs! They haunt my lover and her friends.
We need to teach them a lesson. Destroy Hound Turek, Infantry Turek Orcs, Time Turek Orcs, The Outfitter Turek Orcs, Archer Orcs Turek, Bandit Turek Orcs, Seer Turek Orcs, Lord Of The Turek Orcs, The Tetrarch Of Turek Orc. I myself am an Orc, but...
Around the world there's nothing more important than my favorite.
Destroy the Turek Orcs, and at the same time explore how things are going in the Camp of Orcs. I want to know what happened with the Spirits. Thanks for the help!
